taxonomicnotes: Hora (1928) described Danio shanensis from Myanmar. Fang (2001) treated it under the genus Devario.
rationale: This species has been recorded from two drainages by later workers, so it could be a more widely distributed species although this required confirmation. The impact of harvests for the aquarium trade also required further information. For this reason it is considered as Data Deficient.
evaluator: Daniel, B.A., Rema Devi, K.R., Arunachalam, M. & Dahanukar, N.
